text:
Dear All,

My name is Scott

We currently use HubSpot as the platform for our website and are engaged with a web developer. This developer is looking for some help with coding specific compare features on our website finishes page. If you have experience in working inside HubSpot platforms, and Adobe XD (page build was done here) and able to help us with getting a compare feature to work, please reach out. Rate negotiable.

Hi Scott,

I can help you. I have developed multiple HubSpot themes and modules.

HubSpot Themes <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/website?eco_providers=oAppsIT>
HubSpot Modules <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/modules?eco_providers=oAppsIT>
